function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Misinterpretation of data on IPV and DV rates leading to inaccurate conclusions and decision-making.","Impact":"Failed interventions, misallocated resources, and ineffective policies for addressing IPV and DV.","Mitigation":"Implement rigorous data analysis and verification processes before drawing conclusions or making policy decisions.","Technologies":"Data analytics tools, statistical software, and verification protocols for data sources.","People":"Public health officials, policymakers, and researchers.","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions, and government bodies."},{"Description":"Public dissemination of uncritically reported news stories and data on IPV and DV rates.","Impact":"Misinformation, public perception distortion, and understating the severity of IPV and DV.","Mitigation":"Establish fact-checking processes for news reporting and promote critical evaluation of data before dissemination.","Technologies":"Fact-checking tools, data validation software, and media reporting guidelines.","People":"Journalists, media organizations, and news editors.","Owner":"Media regulatory bodies and journalism associations."},{"Description":"Exposure of preliminary research results on IPV and DV to the media prior to peer review.","Impact":"Misrepresentation of research findings, premature public panic, and erosion of trust in academic research.","Mitigation":"Enforce ethical guidelines for research dissemination and establish strict embargoes on releasing research findings to the media.","Technologies":"Embargo management systems, research communication platforms, and media embargo enforcement tools.","People":"Academic researchers, peer reviewers, and journalists.","Owner":"Research institutions, academic journals, and media organizations."}]}
